alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Lake of the Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 11:59PM CDT until July 27 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... South central Lake of the Woods County in north central Minnesota... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carmel, or 36 miles east of Thief River Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thorhult, Carmel, Malcolm, Jelle, Fourtown and Oaks Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
